text: Frank Hughes Murkowski (; born March 28, 1933) is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was a United States Senator from Alaska from 1981 until 2002. He was the eighth Governor of Alaska, from 2002 until 2006. His daughter is U.S. Senator Lisa Murkowski. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Alaska Category:Politicians from Seattle Category:United States senators from Alaska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Frank Murkowski
